import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vacations', templateUrl: './vacations.component.html', styleUrls: ['./vacations.component.css'] }) export class VacationsComponent implements OnInit { vacations: any; modeUser: boolean = false; modeAdmin: boolean = false; showLoginModal: boolean = false; isLogin: boolean = false; showNewVacationModal: boolean = false; showVacationUpdate: boolean = false; showVacationDelete: boolean = false; showRegiterModal: boolean = false; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.http.get('https://react-node-mysql-jwt.herokuapp.com/vacations') .subscribe(data => { this.vacations = data; }); } }
